titleInfo.title: Differential sperm expenditure reveals a possible role for post-copulatory sexual selection in a lekking moth

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Cordes, Nils, Yiğit, Arzu, Engqvist, Leif, and Schmoll, Tim. 2013. “Differential sperm expenditure reveals a possible role for post-copulatory sexual selection in a lekking moth”. Ecology and Evolution 3 (3): 503-511.
